name: Plok in Clock!
description:
THE GAME

Plock in Clock! is a 2D platform game, the player controls a square that must go from point A to point B. 

This cube has a capacity, he can freeze himself when he wants, which creates a "cube corpse" in the Level Design and this corpse becomes a full-fledged platform and the "living" cube reappears. 

So the player can get to point B in several ways, the first is by using the basic Level Design, or he can use the main mechanic to create his own path or to help himself in cramped places. 

Of course the player can't freeze his cube in certain areas, which creates additional difficulty. It is also important to know that each level has a time limit (x seconds) at the end of which the cube automatically freezes, then the player reappears and so on.

CONTEXT

This game was made during the Ludum Dare 47,  October 2020. It was our first (inter)national Game Jam!
